name: argus
description: Argus is a self-hosted monitoring and notification system for watching new releases on GitHub and other platforms. It lets users define version checks and send alerts to integrations like Slack, Discord or email.
features: Release Monitoring: Track new software releases on GitHub and other platforms. Stay updated automatically.
Version Checks: Define custom rules for detecting version updates. Flexible monitoring.
Multi-Platform: Monitor releases from GitHub, Docker Hub, and more. Universal coverage.
Alert Integration: Send notifications to Slack, Discord, email, and webhooks. Get notified your way.
Web Dashboard: View all monitored projects and their status at a glance. Centralized overview.
Self-Hosted: Run on your own infrastructure for privacy and control. Your monitoring, your server.
